000: After Clause 35, insert the following new Clause—
“Electoral Commission and Charity Commission: joint guidance
text.IndentOne: Before the commencement of this Act the Minister shall require the Electoral Commission and the Charity Commission to produce joint guidance on the requirements of Part 2 as they apply to charities.”

text.quote: 000: After Clause 41, insert the following new Clause—
text.IndentOne: The Minister must before the end of the period of two years, beginning with the day on which this Act is passed, appoint a person to review generally the operation of this Act.”
